scripts.build:all: pnpm run build:chrome && pnpm run build:firefox
scripts.zip:all: pnpm run zip:chrome && pnpm run zip:firefox
scripts.package:chrome: pnpm run build:chrome && pnpm run zip:chrome
scripts.package:firefox: pnpm run build:firefox && pnpm run zip:firefox
scripts.package:all: pnpm run build:all && pnpm run zip:all
scripts.debug:chrome: pnpm run build:chrome && echo "Chrome extension built. Loading instructions:" && echo "1. Open Chrome and go to chrome://extensions/" && echo "2. Enable 'Developer mode' (top right toggle)" && echo "3. Click 'Load unpacked' and select the 'dist-chrome' folder" && echo "4. The extension should now be loaded and ready for debugging"
scripts.debug:firefox: pnpm run build:firefox && echo "Firefox extension built. Loading instructions:" && echo "1. Open Firefox and go to about:debugging" && echo "2. Click 'This Firefox' in the sidebar" && echo "3. Click 'Load Temporary Add-on...'" && echo "4. Select the 'manifest.json' file in the 'dist-firefox' folder" && echo "5. The extension should now be loaded and ready for debugging"
scripts.zip:firefox-review: zip -r firefox-review-submission.zip src/ dist-firefox/ BUILD_INSTRUCTIONS.md REVIEWER_NOTES.md build.sh package.json tsconfig.json webpack.config.js pnpm-lock.yaml README.md LICENSE PRIVACY_POLICY.md .gitignore
scripts.package:firefox-review: pnpm run build:firefox-review && pnpm run zip:firefox-review
scripts.check: pnpm run type-check && pnpm run lint && pnpm run format:check
scripts.fix: pnpm run lint:fix && pnpm run format
